Package index

All functions

corrupt_mat_randomly()
Corrupt given matrix with random missingness
get_pcp_defaults()
Retrieve default PCP parameter settings for given matrix
grid_search_cv()
Cross-validated grid search for PCP models
hard_threshold()
Hard-thresholding operator
matrix_rank()
Estimate rank of a given matrix
proj_rank_r()
Project matrix to rank r
queens
Daily chemical concentrations of 26 PM2.5 species from Queens, NY (2001-2021)
root_pcp()
Square root principal component pursuit (convex PCP)
rrmc()
Rank-based robust matrix completion (non-convex PCP)
sim_data()
Simulate data
sing()
Compute singular values of given matrix
sparsity()
Estimate sparsity of given matrix

Developed by Lawrence G. Chillrud, Jaime Benavides, Elizabeth A. Gibson, Junhui Zhang, Jingkai Yan, John N. Wright, Jeff Goldsmith, Marianthi-Anna Kioumourtzoglou.
